guideline.name: FDA PGx Association [Pharmacogenetic Associations for which the Data Support Therapeutic Management Recommendations]: Siponimod - CYP2C9

relatedGenes.name: cytochrome P450 family 2 subfamily C member 9

recommendations.name: Recommendation Annotation PA166312703
recommendations.population: Affected subgroup: CYP2C9 intermediate or poor metabolizers

text.html: "Results in higher systemic concentrations. Adjust dosage based on genotype. Do not use in patients with CYP2C9 *3/*3 genotype. Refer to FDA labeling for specific dosing recommendations."
